description: A kevlar pouch created specifically to house a UPS. Wiring allows access to the UPS without removal.
A large plastic water canteen, with a 2.5 liter capacity and carrying strap. A bit of ductape and cellulose provide suprisingly effective insulation for the contents.
A military-style water canteen with a 1.5 liter capacity.  Commonly worn at the hip. A bit of ductape and cellulose provide suprisingly effective insulation for the contents.
